prayers2.line: For He Whom You did merit to bear.
Pray for us to our God
Rejoice and be glad, O Virgin Mary
For the Lord has risen indeed

closing_prayer2.text: O God, who gives joy to the world through the Resurrection of your Son, Our Lord Jesus Christ, grant that we may obtain, through his Virgin Mother, Mary, the joys of everlasting life, through the same Christ Our Lord. Amen.
closing_prayer2.blessing: May your divine assistance always remain with us and may the souls of the faithful departed through the mercy of God rest in peace. Amen.
closing_prayer2.glory_be: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Spiritâ€¦ (3 times)
